Origin.Name: Phase.DartProduct.dartModuleProducts.FluxTrackingModeProducts.BrfProductsProperties.maximalThetaImages
Origin.Label: Maximal zenith angle of images
Origin.Description: This is a threshold on the zenith angle of view directions: only images with a zenith angle smaller than this threshold are stored (in order to save computer memory)

Message.OriginMessage: Value '-1.0' is lower than minimum available value '0.0'
